reuters.title: DIXONS BOOSTS CYCLOPS <CYL> OWNERSHIP TO 83 PCT
reuters.body: <Dixons Group Plc> said it bought about 2,445,000 Cyclops Corp common shares, boosting its holdings of the company's stock to about 83 pct of those now outstanding and 79 pct on a fully diluted basis. Dixons said the stock was purchased in a single block transaction at 95 dlrs per share. The company said it expects to proceed with a merger and has advised Cyclops it intends to increas the per-share amount to be paid in the merger to 95 dlrs, form 90.25 dlrs, for each of the about 880,000 remaining Cyclops shares outstanding on a fully diluted basis.
